infos.value: It's finally within view... Wezette Castle.
I will ask you one last time.
Do you really intend to meet with King Khury?
That is why we've come all this way.
I'll protect Lord Mont and our group.
I wonder if you will be able to...
H-hey now. It would help if you were less ominous in your speech.
You can hear the voices of the stars!?
Well? What're they saying, Ramada? Should we pull back?
Such are the perils of war...
However... If we retreat, it may cause far more to fall.
Then we've no choice but to proceed.
